snippet: MUNDY--Meg, died on January 12, 2016. Born in London on January 4, 1915, she was an actress, model and editor. She is survived by her son Sotos and granddaughter Margaret Yannopoulos. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MUNDY--Meg, died on January 12, 2016. Born in London on January 4, 1915, she was an actress, model and editor. She is survived by her son Sotos and granddaughter Margaret Yannopoulos. 1/3
